text: llh mulk alsamawat wal'ard wama fihima mlkana wtdbyrana w'ihatt, la yakhfaa ealayh shy'. wama tzhrwh mimaa fi 'anfusikum 'aw tukhfuh fa'iina allah yelmh, wsyhasbkm bh, fyefw emn ysha', wywakhdh min ysha'. wallah qadir ealaa kl shy', waqad akrm allah almuslimin baed dhlk fefa ean hadith alnafs wkhtrat alqalb ma lam yatbaeuha kalam 'aw eml, kama thabat dhlk ean rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm
